head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHANAHAN, GERALD F.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHANAHAN, GERALD F.

block.p: SHANAHAN-Gerald F. On September 27, 2000 of Cold Spring Harbor, NY. Beloved husband of the late Dolores. Loving father of Laura Shanahan, Karen Dufour, Susan Rule, Diane Handlmaier and Gerald Shanahan. Cherished grandfather of T.J. Kristen and Lauren Dufour, Ryan, Garrett and Austin Rule and Michael and Katherine Handlmaier. Dear brother of Vincent, James, Mary Kuefner and the late Raphael Shanahan. Loving companion of Rose Otrin. Visiting at the Fairchild Chapel, Franklin Ave. at 12th Street, Garden City, NY 2-5 & 7-9PM Saturday and Sunday. Mass of Christian burial St. Joseph's Church, Garden City at 11 AM Monday. Interment Flushing Cemetery, Flushing, NY.
